name: GPT Repository Access
description: Direct GPT-5 access with full repository control — read files, edit code, run commands.
longDescription:
Vecto Pilot AI (Unified SDK • GPT-5) plans → diffs → commits.
- Browser holds your GitHub token (PAT or Device Flow)
- Server clones per-request, applies unified diff, pushes branch, opens PR
- Optional local-Repl FS bridge via experimental APIs

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Read any file in your App

scopes.name: write-exec
scopes.reason: Write to files and run shell/commands for fixes

scopes.name: repldb:read
scopes.reason: Load cached plans/diffs for this App

scopes.name: experimental-api
scopes.reason: Use experimental fs/process APIs from the pane
